description:
EnergyPlus™ is a whole building energy simulation program that engineers, architects, and researchers use to model both energy consumption and water use in buildings.

This is the EnergyPlus Development Repository.

The Department of Energy maintains a public website for EnergyPlus where you can find much more information about the program. https://energyplus.net/

For detailed developer information, consult the wiki. https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/wiki

Many users (and developers) of EnergyPlus are active on Unmet Hours, so that's a great place to start if you have a question about EnergyPlus or building simulation. https://unmethours.com/questions/

For more in-depth, developer-driven support, please utilize the EnergyPlus Helpdesk. https://energyplushelp.freshdesk.com/support/home
name: EnergyPlus™ v.23.2.0 2023 [SWR-17-23]
